part_description: Consists of a tall central spout and two handles. The spout is curved, and each handle is similarly shaped, positioned symmetrically on either side.
internal_interaction_description: The central spout allows water flow when the handles are turned. Each handle controls either hot or cold water, regulating temperature and pressure. The internal plumbing connects these components, ensuring coordinated function.
external_interaction_description: Designed for installation on sinks, interacting with plumbing to deliver water. Users rotate handles to adjust water flow and temperature. The set complements modern bathroom or kitchen decor, enhancing aesthetic appeal.
